Apply Here!


If your not quite sure of the nature of this volunteer position, be sure to read the FAQ to the left. Click on the links below and read the descriptions for each seminar. Determine which seminar interests you most, and follow the directions to apply.

(Note: New facilitator applicants are contacted around week 10 of each semester to be considered for the following semester.)


Inspired Learning & Teaching Seminar
Inspire students to apply the five eternal learning principles associated with the BYU-Idaho Learning Model

Academic Planning Seminar
Assist students in understanding how to use the academic resources available at BYU-Idaho to successfully plan their academic path.

Realize the Vision Seminar
Help students realize the prophetic vision of BYU-Idaho to become disciple leaders throughout their lives.
